caption: Table 1: Hyper-parameter values relevant to R2D2 in the ERELELA architecture presented. All missing parameters follow the ones in Ape-X [30].
description: This table lists the hyperparameters used for the off-policy RL algorithm R2D2 in the ERELELA architecture.  It includes parameters such as the number of actors, actor update interval, sequence length, replay buffer size, discount factor, optimizer, and learning rate.  Parameters not explicitly listed here use the default values from the Ape-X algorithm.
